Description: Central section of a steatite shabti of Pediamenope with the head broken away, the remains of a lappet-wig, crossed hands in low relief holding the low relief hoes, the waist is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in one(surviving) row of incised hieroglyphs almost encircling the body, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised depiction of the string of a seed-bag, the legs are missing.
Condition: incomplete - head and lower section missing
